::Dollen::

"Ok. Come on StarScream. I guess these are our new orders."
He starts to follow when the ambush begins.
"Man! Do these guys have bad timeing or what?!"
He opens fire on Tankorr.

::DrillBit::

"Killfest. Who all do you want to follow? We have to keep a good number
of troops here."
